titleStmt.title: Agenda for TEI Council Meeting, May 15-17, 2003

change.item: Posted May 11 to TEI-Council mailing list

div.p: Except as noted, the following are expected to attend.

Council Members:
Alejandro Bia
David J. Birnbaum
Matthew Driscoll
David Durand
Toma? Erjavec
Merrilee Proffitt (arriving Friday mid-day)
Sebastian Rahtz
Laurent Romary (not attending)
Susan Schreibman
John Unsworth, Chair
C. Perry Willett
Christian Wittern

Time and Place: The meeting is scheduled to start at 1 p.m. on Thursday, May 15th, at Rewley House, Wellington Square, Oxford, and concluding at 5:30 p.m.. Friday we'll meet again, starting at 9 a.m., at Rewley House, and concluding at 5:30 p.m.. If necessary, the meeting will continue on Saturday, either at the offices of Ingenta or at OUCS. A map showing Rewley House in relation to the Oxford Bus (coach) and train stations can be found at http://www.kellogg.ox.ac.uk/images/newoxonmap2002.jpg

list.item:
1-3:15 pm: Character Encoding Workgroup Reports and Recommendations
Christian Wittern: Workgroup Reports (Council members should review CEW01 (this is intended as a replacement for P4 Chapter 4) and CEW06 (intended to replace P4 Chapter 25) at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/CE/)
The Editors: Cdata Attributes (Council members should review EDW79)
Christian Wittern: Recommendations
3:30-4:30 pm: David Durand: Standoff Markup Workgroup (Workgroup documents are at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/SO/)
4:30-5:30 pm: Alex Bia and Susan Schreibman, Nominations Committee and SGML to XML migration workgroup updates (workgroup documents are at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/MI/)
9 a.m.-noon: Sebastian Rahtz, MetaLanguage Task Force Report (Council members should review the Task Force's status report, at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/META/)
1:30-2:15 pm: Sebastian Rahtz, Licensing the TEI Guidelines and Derivative Products
2:15-3:15 pm: Matthew Driscoll, Manuscript Description Task Force (Task Force documents are at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/MS/)
3:30-4:00 pm: Lou Burnard, Feature Structures Task Force (Task Force Documents are at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/FS/)
4:30-5 pm: John Unsworth, Trees and Graphs Task Force (Task Force Documents are at http://www.tei-c.org/Activities/GD/)
5-5:30 pm: John Unsworth, Recommendations to the Board for Chair of the Council
If other items are added to the agenda, or if we fall behind the schedule proposed above, we may meet from 9-noon on Saturday.
